price: 34. Ya soló, babangi (Allah) bakozalaka epai ya Nkolo na bango na lola ya kitoko.
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
